summary: Jewelry order management system with design image uploads and PDF export functionality
architectural_notes: Design images are uploaded via a Design Image Page and stored by design code
PDF export functionality exists but currently not embedding images correctly
Previous PDF format had green headers and visual formatting that needs restoration
known_issues: PDF export shows placeholder text like [Design Image: CHTMN40009] instead of actual images
PDF export lost colorful structure and green headers from previous version
Design images exist in system but PDF generation not fetching them properly

existing_features.title: Fix PDF export to embed actual design images from the Design Image Page instead of showing placeholder text like '[Design Image: CHTMN40009]'. The system must fetch uploaded design images by design code and convert them to a format suitable for PDF embedding (base64 or similar).

Restore the colorful PDF export structure from the previous version, including green header rows for each design group, visual distinction between design sections, and sorting orders by design code from lower to higher within each group.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix PDF export to embed actual design images instead of placeholder text
Restore colorful PDF structure with green headers and design code sorting (lower to higher)
